statements: SELECT * FROM HazardousWasteDisposalMethods WHERE method_id = 1;
SELECT method_name, cost FROM HazardousWasteDisposalMethods WHERE cost > 500;
SELECT * FROM HazardousWasteDisposalMethods WHERE effectiveness < 3.00 ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT method_id, method_name FROM HazardousWasteDisposalMethods WHERE cost BETWEEN 100 AND 500;
SELECT method_name, cost, effectiveness FROM HazardousWasteDisposalMethods WHERE cost < 500 AND effectiveness > 3.50 ORDER BY method_name ASC, cost DESC;
SELECT method_name, cost FROM HazardousWasteDisposalMethods ORDER BY cost DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM HazardousWasteDisposalMethods WHERE effectiveness > 3.5
SELECT method_name, cost, effectiveness FROM HazardousWasteDisposalMethods WHERE cost <= 500
SELECT * FROM HazardousWasteDisposalMethods ORDER BY method_id ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT method_id, method_name FROM HazardousWasteDisposalMethods WHERE cost BETWEEN 200 AND 800
SELECT * FROM hazardous_waste_disposal_costs ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT method_name, cost FROM hazardous_waste_disposal_costs WHERE cost > 1000;
SELECT method_name, effectiveness_percent FROM hazardous_waste_disposal_effectiveness WHERE effectiveness_percent >= 75.00;
SELECT method_name FROM hazardous_waste_disposal_costs WHERE disposal_method_id = 2;

SELECT * FROM hazardous_waste_disposal_costs JOIN hazardous_waste_disposal_effectiveness ON hazardous_waste_disposal_costs.disposal_method_id = hazardous_waste_disposal_effectiveness.disposal_method_id;
SELECT * FROM hazardous_waste_disposal_costs;
SELECT method_name, cost FROM hazardous_waste_disposal_costs ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT method_name, effectiveness_percent FROM hazardous_waste_disposal_effectiveness WHERE effectiveness_percent > 80;
SELECT method_name, cost FROM hazardous_waste_disposal_costs WHERE cost BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY cost ASC;

SELECT method_name, cost, effectiveness_percent FROM hazardous_waste_disposal_costs JOIN hazardous_waste_disposal_effectiveness ON hazardous_waste_disposal_costs.disposal_method_id = hazardous_waste_disposal_effectiveness.disposal_method_id;
SELECT * FROM hazardous_waste_disposal_methods;
SELECT method_name, cost FROM hazardous_waste_disposal_methods WHERE cost > 1000;
SELECT site_name, location, capacity FROM waste_sites ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT report_date, amount_collected FROM waste_reports WHERE effectiveness_rating >= 3.5;
SELECT disposal_method_id, method_name, cost, effectiveness FROM hazardous_waste_disposal_methods WHERE cost < 500 AND effectiveness > 3.0;
SELECT * FROM hazardous_waste_disposal_methods;
SELECT method_name, cost FROM hazardous_waste_disposal_methods ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT site_name, location, capacity FROM waste_sites WHERE capacity > 1000;
SELECT method_name, cost, effectiveness FROM hazardous_waste_disposal_methods WHERE cost < 5000 AND effectiveness > 4.5;
SELECT site_name, report_date, amount_collected, effectiveness_rating FROM waste_reports WHERE report_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM HazardousWasteDisposalMethods;
SELECT method_name, cost FROM HazardousWasteDisposalMethods WHERE cost > 1000;
SELECT method_name, cost, effectiveness FROM HazardousWasteDisposalMethods WHERE cost < 5000 ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT * FROM HazardousWasteReports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01' AND report_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT facility_name, location FROM WasteFacilities WHERE location LIKE '%California%';
SELECT * FROM HazardousWasteDisposalMethods WHERE cost > 1000 ORDER BY method_name DESC;

SELECT method_name, cost, effectiveness FROM HazardousWasteDisposalMethods JOIN HazardousWasteReports ON HazardousWasteDisposalMethods.method_id = HazardousWasteReports.method_id WHERE disposed_quantity > 500 ORDER BY effectiveness ASC, cost DESC;
SELECT facility_name FROM WasteFacilities WHERE location LIKE '%California%' ORDER BY facility_name;
SELECT SUM(disposed_quantity) AS total_disposed FROM HazardousWasteReports GROUP BY method_id HAVING total_disposed > 5000 ORDER BY total_disposed DESC;

SELECT facility_name, SUM(disposed_quantity) AS total_disposed FROM WasteFacilityReports JOIN WasteFacilities ON WasteFacilityReports.facility_id = WasteFacilities.facility_id GROUP BY facility_id HAVING total_disposed < 10000 ORDER BY total_disposed ASC;
SELECT * FROM HazardousWasteDisposalMethods;
SELECT method_name, cost FROM HazardousWasteDisposalMethods WHERE cost > 1000;
SELECT method_name, cost, effectiveness FROM HazardousWasteDisposalMethods ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT method_name, cost, effectiveness FROM HazardousWasteDisposalMethods WHERE effectiveness >= 0.8;
SELECT method_name, cost, effectiveness FROM HazardousWasteDisposalMethods WHERE method_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM HazardousWasteDisposalMethods;
SELECT method_name, cost FROM HazardousWasteDisposalMethods WHERE cost > 500;
SELECT * FROM WasteDisposalReports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT company_name, email FROM WasteDisposalCompanies WHERE contact_person IS NOT NULL;
SELECT report_id, hours_worked FROM EmployeeReports WHERE efficiency_rating >= 4.0;
